description: Installs Cron Control Runner into the Dev Environment

enabled.description: Whether to install Cron Control Runner

fpm-socket.description: Address of the PHP-FPM socket. If not set, WP CLI will be used to run the cron jobs (slower).

wp-cli-path.description: Path to the WP CLI binary; required if `fpm-socket` is not set

install-runit-service.description: Whether to install a runit service for the Cron Control Runner
